newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary BUX ends officially at 5,864.43 pts.
newsitem.headline: Hungary BUX ends officially at 5,864.43 pts.

text.p: The BUX index of the Budapest Stock Exchange ended officially at 5,864.43 points, down 38.06, unchanged from the preliminary figures.
Spot share turnover totalled 4.69 billion forints.
BUX futures ended mixed and little changed, down by between four and 47 points for the three nearest maturities and advancing by between two and 15 points for the long maturities.
June BUX eased eight points to 6,155 points.
